name: Digital Spot Bidding (Basic)
description: Move from phone-based spot sourcing to digital bidding platform for price transparency and faster placement
benchmarkSource: TMS optimization typically delivers 3-7% savings on spot freight via better sourcing discipline
typicalROI: 3-7% reduction in spot freight cost, 15-25% faster placement

name: Reverse Auction Engine (Multi-round)
description: Multi-round digital auctions for contract and dedicated fleet sourcing with live bidding
benchmarkSource: Reverse auctions can deliver 8-15% freight cost reduction through competitive bidding
typicalROI: 8-15% contract rate reduction, 20-30% reduction in tender cycle time

name: Contract Rate Governance & Fuel Indexation
description: Systematic rate card management with fuel price indexation and quarterly reviews

name: Lane-level Rate Benchmarking vs Market
description: Compare contracted rates against market benchmarks by lane, identify savings opportunities
typicalROI: 5-10% savings on outlier lanes, better negotiation leverage

name: Lane Bundling / Portfolio-based Tendering
description: Bundle lanes into portfolios for better carrier commitment and volume discounts
benchmarkSource: Portfolio tendering can achieve 8-15% cost reduction through volume consolidation

name: Mode Mix Policy (Road vs Rail/Sea/Air)
description: Optimize mode selection based on cost, service requirements, and lead times
benchmarkSource: Mode shift to rail can reduce freight costs by 10-20% and emissions by 15-30%
typicalROI: 10-20% cost savings on bulk lanes, significant CO₂ reduction

name: Dedicated vs Market Fleet Mix Optimisation
description: Balance owned/dedicated fleet against spot market for optimal cost and flexibility

name: Volume Commitment & Take-or-Pay Optimisation
description: Structure carrier contracts with volume commitments for better rates and guaranteed capacity

name: Incentive Schemes & Penalties (OTIF-linked)
description: Link carrier payments to OTIF performance with bonus/penalty structure

name: LTL→FTL Load Consolidation (Multi-drop)
description: Consolidate less-than-truckload shipments into full truckloads with multi-drop routing
benchmarkSource: Load consolidation delivers 8-15% freight savings through better capacity utilization
typicalROI: 8-15% PKMMT reduction, 15-30% reduction in LTL shipments

name: 3D Load Building / Cube Optimisation
description: Advanced 3D packing algorithms to maximize cube utilization considering weight, dims, stacking

name: Weight + Volume Dual Optimisation
description: Optimize loads against both weight and volume constraints simultaneously

name: Axle-load-aware Loading (Bulk)
description: Balance loads across axles to maximize legal weight without violations
typicalROI: 5-10% weight utilization gain, 50-80% reduction in overload fines

name: Multi-principal Load Mixing (3PL)
description: Combine loads from multiple customers on same vehicle for 3PL consolidation

name: Palletisation & Unit-load Design Standards
description: Standardize packaging on pallets for faster loading and better cube usage

name: MOQ / Full-truck-order Rules Linked to Capacities
description: Set customer order minimums aligned to vehicle capacities to reduce LTL

name: Dynamic Consolidation Windows (Planning Horizon Tuning)
description: Adjust order consolidation windows based on volume patterns to balance service and cost
typicalROI: 5-12% utilization gain with minimal service impact

name: Temperature-zone Segregation within Vehicles (Cold Chain)
description: Multi-temp zone loading for mixed ambient/chilled/frozen products
typicalROI: 10-20% vehicle reduction for cold chain, better product quality

name: Primary/Linehaul Route Optimisation (Distance/Toll/Time)
description: Optimize main lane routing considering distance, toll costs, and transit time
benchmarkSource: Route optimization delivers 2-5% distance/cost savings and 5-12% transit time improvement

name: Street-level Routing & Drop Sequence (Secondary/Tertiary)
description: Optimize multi-drop delivery sequences at street level for last-mile efficiency

name: Time-window Routing (Stores, Plants, Ports)
description: Route optimization respecting delivery time windows and appointment slots

name: Dynamic Re-routing Based on Live Events
description: Real-time route adjustments for traffic, weather, breakdowns, order changes

name: Multi-day Tour Planning for Dedicated Fleets
description: Plan multi-day routes for dedicated fleet with backhauling opportunities

name: Driver Shift / Hours-of-Service-aware Routing
description: Route planning respecting driver shift limits and rest requirements
typicalROI: 40-70% reduction in HOS violations, improved driver safety

name: Cluster-based Territory / Beat Planning
description: Group customers into service territories for regular route optimization
typicalROI: 5-12% distribution cost reduction, better service consistency

name: FEFO / Freshness-priority Routing
description: Route prioritization based on product shelf life and expiry dates
typicalROI: 30-50% reduction in expiry claims, better customer satisfaction

name: Hub-and-spoke vs Point-to-point Lane Design
description: Network design optimization: hub consolidation vs direct lanes
typicalROI: 10-20% network cost reduction with service trade-offs

name: Cross-dock vs DC Flow Decisions
description: Optimize which SKUs flow through cross-dock vs storage DC

name: Virtual Pooling of Inventory Across DCs
description: Dynamic inventory allocation across DCs to minimize split shipments

name: Rail-rake vs Road Share Optimisation (Bulk)
description: Optimize rail vs road mode mix for bulk lanes based on cost and service
benchmarkSource: Rail mode shift can reduce freight costs by 15-25% and emissions by 20-35%
typicalROI: 15-25% cost reduction on bulk lanes, major CO₂ savings

name: Rake Composition & Wagon Allocation Planning
description: Optimize rail rake composition and wagon types for different product mixes

name: Inbound Supplier Milk-run Design
description: Optimize inbound collection routes from suppliers to plants

name: Seasonal Overflow DC / Pop-up Hub Planning
description: Plan temporary DCs or hubs for seasonal demand spikes

name: Backhaul Lane Creation & Stitching Networks
description: Identify and create backhaul opportunities by stitching complementary networks

name: Mode-shift Lane Identification (Road→Rail/Sea, Cost & ESG)
description: Systematic identification of lanes suitable for mode shift based on cost and sustainability
benchmarkSource: Mode shift optimization can achieve 10-20% cost reduction and 15-30% emissions reduction

name: Carrier Performance Scorecards & Auto-allocation
description: Score carriers on KPIs and auto-allocate loads to top performers
typicalROI: 5-12% OTIF improvement through better carrier selection

name: Share-of-business Caps per Carrier
description: Set maximum share limits per carrier to reduce concentration risk
typicalROI: Better capacity resilience, reduced single-carrier risk

name: Secondary/Backup Carrier Pool per Lane
description: Maintain qualified backup carriers for each lane for capacity resilience
typicalROI: 8-15% on-time placement improvement, better capacity availability

name: Own Fleet vs 3PL vs Spot Mix Optimisation
description: Optimize the mix of owned, dedicated, and spot capacity

name: Driver / Fleet Loyalty Programs
description: Incentive programs for driver retention and performance

name: Early Payment / Dynamic Discounting
description: Offer early payment to carriers in exchange for rate discounts

name: Carrier Onboarding & Qualification Workflow
description: Systematic carrier qualification process with compliance checks

name: Carrier Capacity Forecasting & Reservation
description: Forecast capacity needs and reserve carrier capacity in advance
typicalROI: 10-20% placement improvement, better peak season handling

name: End-to-end Track & Trace (GPS/Driver App)
description: Real-time shipment tracking via GPS devices or driver mobile apps
typicalROI: 3-7% OTD improvement through proactive exception management

name: Customer-facing Visibility Portal & Notifications
description: Self-service portal for customers to track shipments and receive alerts

name: Multi-site Control Tower (Central View of All Plants / Lanes)
description: Centralized control tower with unified view across all plants and lanes
benchmarkSource: Control towers add 3-5% logistics efficiency and 10-20% labor productivity improvement

name: Proactive Exception Alerting (Rule-based)
description: Automated alerts for delays, deviations, and exceptions with rule engine

name: Predictive ETA & Risk Scoring
description: ML-based predictive ETA and delivery risk scores for proactive management

name: Playbook-driven Exception Workflows
description: Standard operating procedures triggered automatically for exception types

name: Scenario Simulation for Disruptions (What-if for Port Closure, Demand Spike)
description: Simulation tools for testing network resilience to disruptions

name: Digital Twin & Multi-lever What-if Planning
description: Digital twin of network for testing multiple lever combinations before activation
benchmarkSource: Digital twin enables 5-15% cost optimization through scenario testing

name: Gate Scheduling & Appointment Booking
description: Online appointment system for carrier gate slots to reduce yard congestion

name: Slot Booking for Loading/Unloading
description: Time-slot reservation system for dock bays with capacity management

name: Yard Queue Management
description: Real-time queue management and priority handling in yard

name: Weighbridge Automation & Integration
description: Automated weighbridge with TMS integration for faster processing

name: Dock Assignment & Loading Bay Automation
description: Automated dock door assignment based on load type and equipment

name: Checklist-driven Loading/Unloading SOPs
description: Digital checklists for loading quality and safety compliance

name: Shunting / Internal Tractor Optimisation
description: Optimize yard tractor movements for trailer positioning

name: Stockyard Dispatch Sequencing by Grade/Age (Bulk)
description: FIFO/FEFO sequencing for bulk material dispatch from stockyards
typicalROI: 15-25% dispatch TAT reduction, better material quality

name: E-Way Bill Automation
description: Automated E-Way Bill generation integrated with ERP and TMS

name: Auto LR / Consignment Note Generation
description: Automated lorry receipt generation from load plan

name: E-POD with Geofence Lock
description: Electronic proof of delivery with GPS verification at customer location

name: Auto-invoicing on POD or Gate-out
description: Automated freight invoice generation triggered by POD or gate-out event

name: Freight Audit & Auto-reconciliation vs Rate Cards
description: Automated freight invoice validation against contracted rates and accessorials

name: Automated Detention/Demurrage Computation
description: Auto-calculate detention and demurrage charges based on timestamps

name: Contract Repository & Rule Engine
description: Digital contract repository with business rules engine for rate application

name: Route Compliance & No-go Zone Enforcement
description: Enforce approved routes and alert on deviations or no-go zone entry

name: Overload Prevention via Weighbridge Interlocks
description: Gate interlock system preventing overloaded vehicles from departing

name: DG/HAZMAT Routing & Permit Management
description: Specialized routing for dangerous goods with permit tracking

name: Driver HOS & Fatigue Monitoring
description: Track driver hours-of-service and fatigue indicators for safety
typicalROI: 40-70% reduction in HOS violations, improved safety

name: Temperature/Humidity Monitoring for Cold Chain
description: Real-time monitoring of temp-sensitive cargo with alerts

name: Regulatory Document Completeness Checks
description: Automated validation of required documents before dispatch

name: Claims & Incident Analytics
description: Analytics on claims and incidents to identify root causes and prevention
typicalROI: 20-40% claims reduction through root cause analysis

name: CO₂ Accounting per Lane/Mode/Vehicle
description: Calculate and track carbon emissions at lane, mode, and vehicle level

name: Green Carrier Preference Rules
description: Auto-allocate loads to carriers with better emissions profiles
typicalROI: 15-30% green fleet share increase, 8-15% CO₂ reduction

name: Mode Shift for Emissions Reduction
description: Identify and execute mode shifts (road→rail/sea) for sustainability
benchmarkSource: Mode shift to rail reduces emissions by 20-35% and costs by 10-20%

name: Empty-mile CO₂ Optimisation
description: Reduce empty running through backhauls to cut emissions

name: Eco-driving / Fuel-efficiency Programs
description: Driver training and monitoring for fuel-efficient driving practices

name: Delivery Calendar & Order-cutoff Policies
description: Define delivery windows and order cutoff times for planning horizon

name: MOQ / FTL Incentives for Customers
description: Pricing incentives for customers ordering in full truckload quantities

name: Promotional Load Planning & Pre-build
description: Plan and pre-build loads for promotional events to smooth demand

name: VMI Replenishment Trips
description: Vendor-managed inventory replenishment with optimized trip planning

name: Order Splitting & Multi-origin Fulfilment Rules
description: Intelligent order splitting across DCs for optimal cost and service

name: Service-tier-based Routing (Gold/Silver/Bronze)
description: Differentiated routing and carrier assignment based on customer service tier
typicalROI: 8-15% OTD for premium tiers, optimized cost for standard

name: Stock-transfer vs Direct-ship Routing Rules
description: Logic to decide when to ship direct vs via DC for multi-echelon networks

name: Reverse Logistics Load Optimisation
description: Optimize returns and reverse logistics trips with forward loads
typicalROI: 20-40% empty km reduction on reverse trips, 5-12% cost savings

name: Shelf-life / Freshness Service Policies & KPIs
description: Service policies linked to remaining shelf life with FEFO routing
typicalROI: 30-50% reduction in freshness claims, better customer satisfaction
